skillTree.name: Tuskgor Chariot
skillTree.description: Pugnacious and stubborn, the war beasts that pull these ramshackle chariots are grotesque combinations of great boar and mighty ram.

skillTree.name: Razorgor Chariot
skillTree.description: Those strong enough to tame the powerful, unruly Razorgors can harness them for chariots.

skillTree.name: Blood Lust
skillTree.description: "The blood is the prize. The blood is the prize! THE BLOOD IS THE PRIZE!"

skillTree.name: Many-Limbed Fiend
skillTree.description: Hurling themselves into battle, a whirlwind of appendages and weapons strike, unexpected and deadly.

skillTree.name: Will of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: Possessed by a singular, apocalyptic vision and utter hatred, this champion proliferates the Dark Gods' will.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Will of the Dark Gods"

skillTree.name: Uncanny Senses
skillTree.description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.

skillTree.name: Shadow Hide
skillTree.description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Primal Instincts
skillTree.description: The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Thirst
skillTree.description: It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Call to Morrslieb
skillTree.description: The weird, evil moon hangs low in the sky, drawing reverence from its abominable worshippers.

skillTree.name: Forerunner
skillTree.description: Often operating their own battlefield manoeuvres, the unyielding Wargors maraud ahead of the warherd with their Bestigor retinues.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment (when not using a mount)

Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Bestigors units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Encourage for Bestigors units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Alpha Beast
skillTree.description: Certain lesser beasts thrive under a pack leader, if only just to charge them in the right direction to unleash their savagery.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Chaos Warhounds, Razorgor Herd, and Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Chaos Warhounds and Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Breakneck Charioteers
skillTree.description: Spurred forth by the bellowing Wargors, Beastmen chariots scatter all before them with hooves, horns and blades.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment (when using a chariot mount)

Attribute: Causes Terror for Razorgor Chariots units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear for Tuskgor Chariots units
	(Hero's army)
Attribute: Causes Fear and Terror (when using a chariot mount)

skillTree.name: Instrument of Chaos
skillTree.description: Day and night the Wargors brood and plot the myriad ways they can gain the upper hand over their victims.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 5%
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Booze Cravings
backgroundSkills.description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.

backgroundSkills.name: Khorne's Fury
backgroundSkills.description: More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.name: Nurgle's Foul Stink
backgroundSkills.description: This one has something of the compost heap about them…

backgroundSkills.name: Unsated Bloodthirst
backgroundSkills.description: Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)
